channel.title: Community-Rsps Pvp and Pvm
channel.description:
[center][center]Server is called Community-rsps Forums: http://community-rsps.enjin.com/
Started hosting this server 24.02.2015
Client link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/z1koikb0d3e7nj6/Client.rar?dl=0 Should auto download the cache. [SIZE=5]If you cant run the client try this:[/size] 1. Update java and run again 2. Right Click Run 3.Edit Run 4.Ctrl + a + ctrl delete ( remove whatever is in the notepad folder) 5.Replace with this
TITLE Client @echo off cls
java -Xmx800M EGUI
pause
If nothing of this works its because the cache did not download! You will have to download the cache separately. Link is : https://www.dropbox.com/s/v863fykvce851fd/communitycache.zip?dl=0 Put the cache in disk c-users-yourname or the admin name find the communitycache folder and remove whats inside and replace it with the one you downloaded. Remember you need winrar to extract it!
Login and choose your setup! ::pure and 3 choices when you login, mage, range or melee gear, 1 chaotic per person! Untradeble. [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/122c0ib.png[/img] What can you do online? Pvm and pvp. 1.Items needed are spread through the server and are mostly obtainable from doing slayer, bossing and random npcs. Some npcs require certain stats to be able to kill. You can also do clue scrolls which give you random items which will aid you in kill high leverl monsters or pvp.lls
Clue scroll Drop table: Easy: All slayer npcs, rock crabs, giant rock crabs etc Medium: Some bosses some npcs Hard: All bosses and some slayer npcs It spread... Do slayer and you're bound 2 get one :)
Random pk points from bosses: Nex: 20
Free for all events, added ffa into the server so whenever there are many people that are pking i can turn ffa on and people will have way more fun pking.
Ingame highscores for those people that like to train to become the best. Advanced econemy, and im serious, the eco is just sick compared to any other server, just picture this: ags is 10mil to the general store and that is the item with the most value, so yeah... But that dosent make its harder to make money, it only depends if you dont know anything about a rsps or not.
Trivia event EXample: First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp
Clue scrolls, guide on forums on what npcs drop these and drop rates!
2 Quests
Npcs throught the wilderness
Npc kill shop purchase your rights to use the ::yell command
Castle Wars + shop armour = better bounses inside
Slayer + slayer shop
Dungeneering
Pk point chest
2 pk shops
Max combat 200 just because i was tired of 126.
Lots of customs, such as: Polypore Ganodermic Dragon kiteshield Rapier as fast as the speed of light Tokhaar-Khal Death Cape
Fixed all barrow sets with effect, barrow minigame with npcs on top.
Pest control doable with only 1 person if you have op gear ofc. Rewards: Barrow gloves Figher hat Fighter penance for more str bonus Full void Elite void
Duel arena with dupes fixed
Tzhaar npcs drop tokkul with can be used to buy items from a tokkul shop.
Bosses:
All godwars bosses Kbd Dagannoth kings Tormented demons Corporal Beast Nex And alot more bosses for donators! I even created a custom slayer dungeon which contains almost all slayer npcs and custom bosses
Wildywyrm For korasi etc Bork caves for fury etc Revenants for pvp armour better drop rates, sea queens is safe tho! Dragon Caverns for safe dragons etc!
Pking spots: Mage bank, outside there are moles, kill them from dragon kiteshields! Varrock Multi Lava crossing Edgeville Green Dragons
Mage arena minigame With a great shop! Items such as:
Infinity Mage book Master wand Fighter hat, torso Chaotic staff Arcane Spirit Shield Spectral Spirit Shield Elysian Spirit Shield
Custom skilling area!!!!! You actually make money fudgeing thieving and shit! You actually make money fletching and shit! You actually make money doing fudgeing all skills! Sell all your items directly at the skilling spot! Farming like runescape! Farming patch at skilling teleport spot and behing the catherby bank
City teleport when doing quests!
And way way more npcs/bosses using commands!
Commands: ::ancients ::lunars ::normals ::nex ::resetdef ::resetstr You can also rest more skills at the npc located at ::shops ::cwars ::shops, 4 different shops locations! ::Construction to try it! There are also gamblers located close to the bank! Remember only use 1 gambler per person!
Bank pin ::setpin ::removepin ::Enterpin when you relog ::Bears to get clue scrolls lvl 1 i think aswell as the best 1 defence gear helmet!
All item effects such as tzhaar maul + neck etc....
Dicing Gamble your mula for items + cash at ::trade
[SIZE=3]Constum Construction[/size] added it today. heres some pictures of it [url=http://gyazo.com/0192fefbcf098f6c0757b9c6d05c4108]0192fefbcf098f6c0757b9c6d05c4108.png[/url]
[url=http://gyazo.com/e663be07b1c1ccfeb0fea524e79c9c42]e663be07b1c1ccfeb0fea524e79c9c42.png[/url] Portal takes you to a secret place, find out if you join.
This server also has alot of custom items added, such as tokhaar-kahl, polypore, ganodermic, death cape, vine whip etc..
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/r0rosl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/11hz6zm.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2qu15io.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2egfa4h.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/smsvao.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/j8lkw9.png[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/33ncec1.png[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/s1ths2.png[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2dbqsgn.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/i357h5.png[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/2lbeys2.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2ey85j5.png[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/20iuds9.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2dkmm9c.png[/img][/center][/center]

item.title: Community-Rsps Pvp and Pvm
item.dc:creator: @allunited allunited
item.description:
@allunited wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:550190”]Pretty generic looking server you have going on here, and not being prepared with a webclient I can understand but not being prepared with a forum is a no-no. I say that only because people generally will look at the site first to determine the professionalism of the team first (or owner). You should have taken some time to build up a forum before attempting to concern yourself with posting an advertisement. I can understand you’re wanting to go ahead and put some players on your server but regardless, should have done the forum at least install something, few boards etc., that’s better than nothing.

Nonetheless, wish for the best on the server and have fun.[/quote]

Alright use this forums for now.
http://wertyscape.enjin.com/

Read full topic

item.title: Community-Rsps Pvp and Pvm
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Pretty generic looking server you have going on here, and not being prepared with a webclient I can understand but not being prepared with a forum is a no-no. I say that only because people generally will look at the site first to determine the professionalism of the team first (or owner). You should have taken some time to build up a forum before attempting to concern yourself with posting an advertisement. I can understand you’re wanting to go ahead and put some players on your server but regardless, should have done the forum at least install something, few boards etc., that’s better than nothing.

Nonetheless, wish for the best on the server and have fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Community-Rsps Pvp and Pvm
item.dc:creator: @allunited allunited
item.description:
@allunited wrote:

[center][center]Server is called Community-rsps
Forums: http://community-rsps.enjin.com/

Started hosting this server 24.02.2015

Client link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/z1koikb0d3e7nj6/Client.rar?dl=0
Should auto download the cache.
[SIZE=5]If you cant run the client try this:[/size]

  1. Update java and run again
  2. Right Click Run
    3.Edit Run
    4.Ctrl + a + ctrl delete ( remove whatever is in the notepad folder)
    5.Replace with this

TITLE Client
@echo off
cls

java -Xmx800M EGUI

pause

If nothing of this works its because the cache did not download!
You will have to download the cache separately.
Link is : https://www.dropbox.com/s/v863fykvce851fd/communitycache.zip?dl=0
Put the cache in disk c-users-yourname or the admin name find the communitycache folder and remove whats inside and replace it with the one you downloaded. Remember you need winrar to extract it!

Login and choose your setup! ::pure and 3 choices when you login, mage, range or melee gear, 1 chaotic per person! Untradeble.

What can you do online?
Pvm and pvp.
1.Items needed are spread through the server and are mostly obtainable from doing slayer, bossing and random npcs.
Some npcs require certain stats to be able to kill. You can also do clue scrolls which give you random items which will aid you in kill high leverl monsters or pvp.lls

Clue scroll Drop table:
Easy: All slayer npcs, rock crabs, giant rock crabs etc
Medium: Some bosses some npcs
Hard: All bosses and some slayer npcs
It spread…
Do slayer and you’re bound 2 get one

Random pk points from bosses:
Nex: 20

Free for all events, added ffa into the server so whenever there are many people that are pking i can turn ffa on and people will have way more fun pking.

Ingame highscores for those people that like to train to become the best.
Advanced econemy, and im serious, the eco is just sick compared to any other server, just picture this: ags is 10mil to the general store and that is the item with the most value, so yeah…
But that dosent make its harder to make money, it only depends if you dont know anything about a rsps or not.

Trivia event
EXample:
First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp

Clue scrolls, guide on forums on what npcs drop these and drop rates!

2 Quests

Npcs throught the wilderness

Npc kill shop purchase your rights to use the ::yell command

Castle Wars + shop armour = better bounses inside

Slayer + slayer shop

Dungeneering

Pk point chest

2 pk shops

Max combat 200 just because i was tired of 126.

Lots of customs, such as:
Polypore
Ganodermic
Dragon kiteshield
Rapier as fast as the speed of light
Tokhaar-Khal
Death Cape

Fixed all barrow sets with effect, barrow minigame with npcs on top.

Pest control doable with only 1 person if you have op gear ofc.
Rewards:
Barrow gloves
Figher hat
Fighter penance for more str bonus
Full void
Elite void

Duel arena with dupes fixed

Tzhaar npcs drop tokkul with can be used to buy items from a tokkul shop.

Bosses:

All godwars bosses
Kbd
Dagannoth kings
Tormented demons
Corporal Beast
Nex
And alot more bosses for donators! I even created a custom slayer dungeon which contains almost all slayer npcs and custom bosses

Wildywyrm For korasi etc
Bork caves for fury etc
Revenants for pvp armour better drop rates, sea queens is safe tho!
Dragon Caverns for safe dragons etc!

Pking spots:
Mage bank, outside there are moles, kill them from dragon kiteshields!
Varrock Multi
Lava crossing
Edgeville
Green Dragons

Mage arena minigame
With a great shop! Items such as:

Infinity
Mage book
Master wand
Fighter hat, torso
Chaotic staff
Arcane Spirit Shield
Spectral Spirit Shield
Elysian Spirit Shield

Custom skilling area!!!
You actually make money fudgeing thieving and shit!
You actually make money fletching and shit!
You actually make money doing fudgeing all skills!
Sell all your items directly at the skilling spot!
Farming like runescape! Farming patch at skilling teleport spot and behing the catherby bank

City teleport when doing quests!

And way way more npcs/bosses using commands!

Commands:
::ancients
::lunars
::normals
::nex
::resetdef
::resetstr
You can also rest more skills at the npc located at ::shops
::cwars
::shops, 4 different shops locations!
::Construction to try it! There are also gamblers located close to the bank! Remember only use 1 gambler per person!

Bank pin
::setpin
::removepin
::Enterpin when you relog
::Bears to get clue scrolls lvl 1 i think aswell as the best 1 defence gear helmet!

All item effects such as tzhaar maul + neck etc…

Dicing
Gamble your mula for items + cash at ::trade

[SIZE=3]Constum Construction[/size] added it today. heres some pictures of it
0192fefbcf098f6c0757b9c6d05c4108.png

e663be07b1c1ccfeb0fea524e79c9c42.png
Portal takes you to a secret place, find out if you join.

This server also has alot of custom items added, such as tokhaar-kahl, polypore, ganodermic, death cape, vine whip etc…














[/center][/center]
